attributes.action: prepare a guide to alternative facilities available for the short period that Greenwich Park is closed for the Olympic equestrian events.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There is a vocal campaign deliberately exaggerating the impact on Greenwich Park of holding the Olympic equestrian events in the Park.  Claims that the park will be closed during the Olympics are of course nonsense - thousands will be visiting the park to enjoy the Games or to be employed there. Other local facilities are available to minimise any disruption.

rejection.details: Please refer this request to the Olympic Delivery Authority (ODA).
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
